generic: Preserve legal mentions in source code
obligations.name: Preserve legal mentions in source code
obligations.verbatim: 1. All copyright notices must remain intact in all files.

generic: Reproduce license and legal mentions in documentation
obligations.name: Reproduce license and legal mentions in documentation
obligations.verbatim: 2. A copy of this text file must be distributed along with any copies of Qhull that you redistribute; this includes copies that you have modified, or copies of programs or other software products that include Qhull.

generic: Track and mention modifications in the source code
obligations.name: Track and mention modifications in the source code
obligations.verbatim: 3. If you modify Qhull, you must include a notice giving the name of the person performing the modification, the date of modification, and the reason for such modification.
